overview: Austin's queer fitness queen, Erica Nix, leads a cast of Austin queerlebrities in a fantasia of goopy-nonsense and heaven-sent scatalogical logic. Channeling John Waters and Terry Gilliam, Erica may just be the mayor Austin needs, if Austin needs a mayor who dream walks like freddy krueger with a manicure.
tagline: A psychosexual lesbian fantasia of adventure and discovery
title: Erica's First Holy Shit
